title: No epic skin compensation
body:
Hello,

I bought 8 rune pages with RP before preseason and there are no 2 epic skins compensation to me. Could you help me? Thank you!

And now I see you say that only before Sep.1 2017 could get the epic skin, surely you are cheating.

You do not say anything about there is a deadline for buying rune pages with RP and now you say that.

Can you explain it?

replies.body: There has always been a deadline. Nobody tricked you. Stop being delusional.

This was announced in a few different places, first one I was able to find in text is in the [**Preseason Update FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908).

https://i.gyazo.com/a54cb977d272f2d12b36ee3dbb3585df.png
